query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Strategy for Outreach
result.description: This deliverable outlines the outreach activities (i.e. communication and dissemination) that are planned over the course of ELEVATE's lifetime. It will integrate a messaging matrix and set out the proposed target audiences for the detailed activities, key messages for each target group, tools, methods, and channels. The deliverable relates to Task 1.4.

result.title: Strategy for Evaluation and Advancing Knowledge
result.description: This deliverable describes a detailed methodology to review the results, impacts, drivers, and barriers of the recent actions piloted and implemented within CIVITAS. result.title: ICT, IoT and Industry 4.0 technology opportunities for improvement of biomass utilization
result.description: This report analyses the ICT, IoT and Industry 4.0 needs in the biomass utilisation and what benefits could be achieved with new solutions and practices. The barriers to their introduction and the required enablers (technological or other) are discussed.
